data.Name: Sarah Paterson
data.staff_bio: Sarah Paterson came to ICI in March of 2010 after working for the University of Maine System for 12 years in various office management roles.  Her areas of expertise are in reorganization, stream-lining processes, and developing systems for maximizing efficiency.
data.staff_ed:
M.S. Human Development – University of Maine
B.A. Sociology – University of Maine
